name: Unusual Dice in Casino
description:
Do you want to win every time in a casino? This game offers it! 3 Minigames in 1 game.

If you get stuck in minigame 1, try clicking into game frame and spamming [F].

Theme? - You will roll dice after swaping them and win :)!

This game was made for "GMTK Game Jam 2022" Game Jam. The theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 48 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
